title: Where is Rengar?
body: Does Rengar have a permanent ult on cause can't seem to find him in champ select.

replies.body:
He is presently disabled because of a pretty bad bug (something like infinite W/Es) For some reason the notification isn't showing up in client, but it does show in server status.

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce
Exactly, Rengar is being fixed due to the infinite W bug.
